definitions.definition: Under normal conditions or circumstances; usually; most of the time
definitions.example: Normally, I eat breakfast at 6am, but today, I got up late and didn't eat until 9.

definitions.definition: In the expected or customary manner.
To a usual or customary extent or degree.
definitions.example: He was abnormally agitated, she only normally so.

definitions.definition: In the manner of a variable with a Gaussian distribution.
